name: Tower of Handmade Vegan Soaps
description:
Our Beautiful Soaps are Handmade in Yorkshire, using a traditional process that retains all the naturally released glycerine, ensuring a silky moisturising Soap that is kind and nourishing, even to the most sensitive skin.
Made using natural ingredients, they smell divine and make the perfect gift. The Tower Consists of 3 Handmade Vegan Soaps, Each stamped with their scent. 
You also get a choice of tower scents! 

*Cruelty Free
*Vegan
*Paraben Free
*SLS & SLES Free

name: Pamper Gift Set with Handmade Vegan Soaps
description:
Our Beautiful Soaps are Handmade in Yorkshire, using a traditional process that retains all the naturally released glycerine, ensuring a silky moisturising Soap that is kind and nourishing, even to the most sensitive skin.
Made using natural ingredients, they smell divine and make the perfect gift. This Gift set includes 2 Handmade Soaps, a Wooden Nail Brush and a 100% Egyptian Cotton Facecloth.
